title: Aaron Yim
meta_description: I'm a product, design, and data enthusiast studying at UWaterloo.
main_content: Hi, I'm Aaron. PM, Designer, Data Enthusiast I am a Waterloo Engineering student interning at BlackBerry as a Product Manager. I'm passionate about creating tech products with exceptional user-focused design. Currently seeking an internship for January 2019. View my resume My Work YELP BUTLER Product Discovery, UI/UX Design, Data Science Building a case for using contextual recommendations to increase Yelp's stickiness. From industry, market, and tech insights to feature design and solution architecture. View project UW FOOD FINDER Data Analytics, UI/UX Design Helping UWaterloo students find open cafeteria locations in one tap. Menus, reviews, and dietary filters at your fingertips. View project PHOTOGRAPHY Composition, Light, Colour A collection of product, automotive, and event photography. View photography
